It's awesome movie . Actors acting were too good . Specially mr sanjay mishra jis acting is too funny . He is too good actor . When he gets any kinds of roles he play beautifully . Seriously for middle class families it's very difficult to run their household Spense . And now a days each and every products is very expensive . If a person is earning 20,000 rs or 47,000 rs he has to do more savings . Difficulties faced buy clerk's and teachers .  It's very low paidjob.  Doctors engineers are very well paid job because they are getting money from hospital and corporate sectors regular basis .

A wonderful movie with characters from everyday life. The movie deals with the problem of every middle class household. Sanjay Mishra is outstanding in a role tailor made for him......must watch for every member of every family......
A Must Watch ❤ Amazing Screenplay and story. New concept and it's Fun to watch ❤
Nice realistic must watch movie.Brilliant script,direction and excellent performance from all actors.
Very good social message giving movie. Good theme.good story.

Ah!!! very nice movie with a family touch. nothing cinematic. very realistic.
